page.title: 04GHOSTHUNTING IN CHESTER
page.content: This is a new attraction and is becoming increasingly popular.It is organised by the {Chester Vistor {Centre}three times a week,when a guide takes a small group,of people on a two hour trip to see regular "hauntings". These include ones at the Malbrough Arms where the landlord slit his throat over a barrel of beer,and where the{ghostly gargles}are regulary heard .Another is at Bewlay's pipe shop which is home for "Sarah", a poltergeist who continually disrupts the stocks. The group continues along to the canal where a mutilated man floats across the tow path! Talks and discussions follow when questions are asked such as "What time does the lost cavalier haunt the castle walls?"!
